summary: I Really Like The Way It's Setup.
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: Quite possibly the best box set I own and it is definitely the tallest! This is indeed an ultimate film collection of the finest gangster films (two of which star Al Pacino). All DVD cases are in a high art shiny magnificence and are all kept in what appears to be a piece of red carpet (or other gangster things depending on your interpretation on how you see velvet lining of the safekeeping box). All in all even if you have these movies already I'd still recommend buying this one it's just that good.
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: I am going to write a summery of these four movies in this Gangster Set in case anyone has yet to watch these movies.  American Gangster is a story of a black man with a dream by the name of Frank Lucus who becomes a drug king pin from 1969-1973 New York Harlem.  Chased after by a stright edge honest cop who will stop at nothing until he gets the person he is going after.  He brings his family into the business and they help him make lot of money each and every single day on the streets of New York.  Frank uses pure herion on the streets and makes local sellers very angery.  In the end Lucus works with the cop Richie who is after him and together bring down many bad cops within New York.  Bonus Material very nice and added touch behind scenes look at the making of the movie.  Scarface had a very good history lesson at beginning of the movie about Cuba sending people over to U.S. about 25,000 of them had criminal records.  The movie itself is a story of a man with a dream and wants what he wants and that is "The world and everything in it." He ends up selling coke and rising up threw the ranks until he is at top of the game in the coke scene.  Rumor is their is roughly 160 or more bad words within the movie, but for those who are wondering the have a bonus feature that counts the bad words and the number of bullet's shot.  Bonus materials very good also enjoy the making of the video game of Scarface.  Casino reminds me of Goodfellas because of some of the cast members but also showing you had the casino works and how's it run day to day by the boss's.  They even go as far as to show how to spot for scammers at the tables.  The good thing about this set is based on two true stories American Gangster and Casino were both inspired or based on true stories.  Then Carlito's Way one of best preformances by Sean Penn and Al Pacino who's character believes in a code of honor and respect and turned into a another great crime triller.  The character also had a big dream and made it happen only difference was in the novel he lives but the director of the movie had other idea for Pacino's character.  The added benifit is all four of these movies is the special editions total 9 disc set 4 disc for the movies and 5 disc for the bonus materials.  So if you like your Gangster sets and enjoy American Gangster, Scarface, Casino, and Carlito's Way. Then buy this set for your collection and enjoy the best movies for a Gangster set ever made for one set.
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: Okay this hasn't been released yet, but WOW!!! Sure I own Scarface and Casino and I have watched them tons of times, but I don't own American Gangster. Plus if you buy American Gangster for $20, why not get 3 great movies with it for only $30 more.I gave this 4 stars because they should've added a little movie called "Goodfellas." Other then that, this rocks!
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: I wanted to see American Gangster amd was going to buy it regardless.  This set already has several great movies in it so i figured i may as well just buy it.  American Ganngster is now one of my fav movies right next to Scarface.  The set is worth it for those two movies alone.  Havent had a chance to see all the extras but im sure i wont be dissappointed.
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: Like many of the other reviewers are saying this set of 4 movies is great. The movies themselves are great and the extras are just as good. In terms of actors you've got Academy Award winners Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe and Sean Penn just to name a few you'll see in these movies. And visionary directors Martin Scorsese, Brian De Palma and Ridley Scott are at their best. All 4 of these movies are a 10 out of 10 and they all have either won or been nominated for many movie awards. I highly recommend this DVD set.
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: I had purchased this item as a gift for my boyfriends father for Christmas.  He LOVED it.  An absolutely beautiful set.  I have seen it.  Has so much in it,  and the box is awesome too.  Has a little shadow of a gangster on the cover.  my only qualm is I wish it was blueray instead since he just got a blueray player for his birthday.  Either way,  this will do -This makes a absolute beautiful gift.  Trust me!
Title: Gangsters - The Ultimate Film Collection: (American Gangster / Scarface / Casino / Carlito's Way)

reviewText: One of the best movie sets around.All movies here are 5 star movies,from American Gangster/Scarface(1983)/Casino/Carlito's Way.I just love this set of movies.
